text: Save the Children is an international NGO that is focused on helping the children who live in desperate situations. I think it would be wise of us to be part of this noble cause
i completely agree.  it's a crying shame that so many children have to live in terrible circumstances.  these kids have done nothing wrong; it's a terrible situation.
Indeed. This organization relies on our donations to keep it going. Don't you think we should help it
without a doubt.  i believe in helping just about any charity; i just wish i had more money to offer.  but i do what i can and charities that involve kids are near the top of my list.
Even a small amount can help much. No donation is small and every penny counts towards helping them
that's a wonderful sentiment.  i'd be happy to make a contribution as this sounds like a fine charity that needs assistance.
Glad to hear that there are such kind and caring people like you still live. How much of your incoming payment are you willing to donate today?
i'd be happy to donate the payment for this hit which is $2
That is very generous from your side. May God increase your bounty in this life and bestow you with all His Grace. Those children would indeed be grateful for your act
thank you so much.  I also believe in God; he is a powerful force in my life and I turn to Him for assistance when i'm in trouble.
Being spiritual helps and most importantly helping the servants of God who are in desperate situation will make you even closer to Him
I truly believe in God.  I know we are not expected to understand why He does everything the way He chooses but i don't have to know the reasons to know He exists.
I have to tell helping those children will make you feel good in the long-run. That is the power of charitable actions

indeed.  that's the beauty of giving to charity.  it helps those who receive as well as those who give.  i have made my share of mistakes in my 62 years but i do my best and I try my best to keep God in mind when i make decisions.
Do you often donate to such charities?

not as often as i should.  i'm on a very tight budget because i've made some real bad financial decisions through the years.  i do make a donation each month to the KLOVE radio network which is a commercial free religious network.

I understand and I hope everything will turn into its way as soon as you may expect. I want to make everything clear now. Are you willing now to go ahead and make $2 payment to Save the Children organization?
i certainly am and i look forward to doing so.
We appreciate your concern and we express our sincere gratitude for your generosity. May God bless you
God bless you as well.  it's been a pleasure speaking with you.  all my best
